name: df-gzinf
body: |- wceq(cgzi, cgox(c1o, co(co(emptycls, cgoe, c1o), cgoa, cgol(c2o, co(co(c2o, cgoe, c1o), cgoi, cgox(emptycls, co(co(c2o, cgoe, emptycls), cgoa, co(emptycls, cgoe, c1o))))))))
comment: The Godel-set version of the Axiom of Infinity. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 14-Jul-2013.)
